metadata.name: Limited Edition #1
metadata.description: The 1st experiential explorative NFT evolved from the Bored Ape Yacht Club into a journey for web3 explorers, investors, freedom-seekers, storytellers, dreamers. 'The Book' is the access-token to an ecosystem of opportunities and experiences that combine web3 and IRL, while developing physical products and a worldwide glamping resort brand with token-gated membership.
